description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Peace conference - the Vietnam Peace Conference in Paris. 2. In the news: For men - men's fashions by Pierre Cardin. The arts: Portrait of a collector - Marcel Lefebvre, oils manufacturer, friend of the painters, and art-collector. Art and scenography - Erte retrospective.
